description.english: The button didn’t stand a chance
You don’t click to win, you click to feel
description.russian: Ты кликаешь не ради победы, а ради ощущений

description.english: You said you’d stop. You lied
This is the last one. Promise
There is no end. Only click
You clicked a lot. That’s it
No water, no rest, just clicks
description.russian: Без воды и отдыха. Только клики

description.english: You stared at it while clicking

description.russian: Буквы никогда не давались так заслуженно

description.english: Your clicking has been acknowledged below
Your clicking has been acknowledged below
